filezilla_config.encryption: Use explicit FTP over TLS if available
filezilla_config.notes: Replace epiz_xxxxx with your actual InfinityFree FTP username and add your password

instructions.step_3: Click 'New Site' and name it 'InfinityFree WordPress'
instructions.step_4: Fill in the details from the filezilla_config above
instructions.step_6: Navigate to /htdocs directory on remote server
tips: Use 'Transfer Queue' to manage large uploads
Enable 'Keep alive' in Settings to prevent timeouts
Create directory bookmarks for quick access

notes: Wait a few minutes after upload for changes to appear
Clear browser cache to see updates
InfinityFree may cache files for up to 5 minutes

common_issues.connection_timeout: Reduce number of concurrent connections to 1-2
common_issues.slow_uploads: InfinityFree free tier has bandwidth limits
common_issues.files_not_appearing: Wait 2-5 minutes for files to sync
